name: The leather belt of unavoidable aggression
data: It increases the users strength impressively.
It decreases the users dexterity a tiny bit.
It increases the users constitution adequately.
It has magnificent armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration poorly.
This item loses its magical powers incredibly slowly.
It can sometimes make the user extremely aggressive.
The buckle of this belt has magical properties.
